message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $15000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can do $13500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to think about my bottom line. I can do $13250. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13000?
